website_summaries.verdict: For a device that's a little bigger than an iPhone 7 Plus with an OtterBox, it charges surprisingly quick.
pros: This very sturdy power bank's charge will last all day, enough to charge a phone 3 to 4 times, and never seems to run out of juice
cons: It's a little larger and heavier than expected

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Had the charger for about 7 months and it died completely. I plugged it in to charge and it never charged and will not turn on again. Customer service contacted me and sent a new one that works properly. Changed my review to 5 stars for the company standong behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for week-long travel, camping and daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Durable designed power bank. I am so glad I got this device. I traveled quite a lot, and having the rise on using e-boarding passes, this is perfect not having to worry about low battery and struggling to find a wall outlet to charge my phone. This is a perfect travel accesory. With its value, you can’t go wrong. You can charge up to 3 devices at the same time. It is also a fast charger. It is quite heavy, however it delivers its purpose very well. I highly recommend this power bank. It will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M

customer_reviews.title: Actually 30k!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a BEAST. I've been looking for a moster to power my lennovo yoga 910 on long plane flights. This thing charges that huge laptop battery at least one time over. If I had to guess it's probably closer to 1.5 times. It will charge my cell phone quite a few times. Very high quality battery. Weigh is proportional to the power of it so stop complaining. :-)
customer_reviews.author: The Boss

customer_reviews.title: Recharged too slowly
customer_reviews.text: Update: it was the charging cable! My apologies. Old problem: I bought this brand because a friend has a smaller unit from the same company and he loves it. I must say I feel I may have a defective unit because I can’t charge my iPad Air 2 and use it at the same time. I’ve had other charging banks that handle this task very well including one I’ve had for about six years.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan S Hawley

customer_reviews.title: Died on me after one camping trip. It won't ...
customer_reviews.text: Died on me after one camping trip. It won't charge now and when it did charge that one time only 2/3 ports work. Updated: the company reached out to me and offered a replacement. Very good customer service so I am updating my review.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Decent price good quality power bank
customer_reviews.text: Not a big review person but have to rate this one. Was looking for a big power bank can handle multiple devices and not too crazy to carry around. Cause I got iPhone and iPad and use frequently. It comes in a nice simple box. Love the design - white and modern. The interested/helpful thing is it got two input plug so if you are in a hurry to leave it can reduce the charge time to half. Used for a week: huge saving for carrying multiple small power banks / charging super fast for iPhone 7, one hour full charge / won’t warm up while charging (love this). Overall, 5 stars product for a decent price and will recommend
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS CHARGER
customer_reviews.text: This unit is bulky when you get it but the power and the battery life is amazing. I had the old poweradd unit rated 20,000mah and it was great. Had it for about 5 years before it finally started acting up. I took it apart and noticed there was a bad connection within the circuitry and decided to just order a new one. I bought this new unit and could not be happier with my decision. Highly recommend this one. but like I said it is way bigger than my other unit.
customer_reviews.author: ruben fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great Power Source
customer_reviews.text: I've used this battery to charge my phone during at least four hikes and haven't had to recharge yet. The phone wasn't all the way dead on any of the hikes but each hike was hours long and I was using the phone to track my hike and to navigate trails. I would give it five stars except it doesn't come with a long cable to connect items to the battery. I was able to order those though but it appeared in the picture that it did come with a long cord.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre E. Mcphillips

customer_reviews.title: Works well.... At first....
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this product in the beginning. It took awhile to charge initially and worked well to charge my kids' tablets quickly but after the first time, I noticed it took increasingly long to charge and also took longer to charge their tablets and the battery also began discharging faster. It still takes an entire day to charge back up too
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Jones

customer_reviews.title: Charges phone multiple times on one charge
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a portable charger (power bank) that will charge multiple phones without dying, this is for you. If you want a small and cute power bank that’s not bulgy, this might not be for you. This power bank does what it’s supposed to do, which is charge your phone multiple times without needing another charge. And because of that, you have to trade in looks for something that’s a little bulgy and big. I have been using it for about two years now through travels and all and it’s held up and still running well.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, but totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these that I bought, after the first got lost or stolen. This thing takes forever to charge, but can charge up a ton of things with the stored energy. It's heavy, but totally worth the weight of lugging it for travel. With 3 kids and 2 adults in our home, when we travel, we have a lot of different electronic devices to charge. This thing is totally up to the task, to ensure everyone has the screens they need!
customer_reviews.author: Heather W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality & Holds a Charge
customer_reviews.text: I own several power banks with this capacity. I paid a few bucks more and upgraded to this top quality unit on a flash sale and it was well worth it. It holds a full charge and goes the distance. It is still showing full power and I tap into it daily. There's a button to monitor how much charge it has left too. So it doesn't need to be plugged in to check. The lower price point models don't hold a full charge for long periods and must be recharged for 12 hours in advance of use to be sure they will go the distance. Not so convenient for natural disaster or power outages.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Giblin

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy and it takes a long time to charge and I recommend to get a case for it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first power bank the things I don't like about this power bank is its heavy and it takes a long time to charge it took me like over 13 hours to charge it did come with some battery and I was able to charg my tablet full battery and my phone halfway and it does come with 2 chords but I have not traveled with it if you want it to last long I recommend to get a case for it
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great battery bank for the Nintendo switch
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve charged my switch 2x without getting the bank to below 75%. This thing is a beast lol. Tried charging my iPhone at the same time but the phone wasn’t cooperating, charges fine by itself though. Worth the purchase. Edit: TSA guidelines don't allow past a certain mAh threshold (~20,000 I think, looked up a while ago and this was well beyond the limit) without special requests. So if you're planning on flying with this, then you're going to be making phone calls prior to every flight or risking losing the bank if a TSA agent calls you out on it. Still great for all the previous reasons, but I had to dock a point just for this.
customer_reviews.author: Pause

customer_reviews.title: Dead On Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work out of the box. Tried charging it for a few hours and it will not take a charge as you can see in the photo. Tried different cables and chargers and it still does not work. Update: I received a reply from their support team and it was determined unit needed to be replaced. I felt unsafe mailing back battery for exchange due to burnt smell so they offered a 19.99 refund. I’m still out about $20 but I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for 9 Months
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase of a power bank and I was initially very impressed with it. It maintained a charge for a long period of time and was great at charging my devices. I purchased the power bank mainly for emergencies and travel. So, it hasn't seen much usage and even less need to charge it due to the longevity of the power bank. However, both ports for charging the power bank appeared to have gone bad in the 9 months that I've had it. One port is completely dead while the 2nd only charges the power bank if you put a finger under the plug and lightly push upward.
customer_reviews.author: JeffTS

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE LOVE THIS UNIT
customer_reviews.text: I purchasd this for an upcoming trip. I only recieved 1 cord for android (yup I have IOS). Emailed regarding missing cord no reply. I have never been ale to charge this unit above the 2 bar mark. I am very disappointed in this product. UPDATE; Shortly after posting this reviews i was contacted by the company who replaced the unit and cords. Wow is this thing amazing, the company even followed up with e-mail to make sure all was working well. THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT & WITH GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE.
customer_reviews.author: Poppinfresh

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a well put together power bank... Especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and I've barely used it. Does seem to charge well, though its only been used briefly a couple times, and the short charging cords that came with it are perfect and feel like they're fairly durable/well made. I used both cords that were included to charge it right after it showed up. Seemed to take a bit longer than expected to charge from half, the battery life when it arrived, to full. Otherwise it seems to serve its purpose well and feels as though its well made.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: I had bought couple of power banks w/ 10000amh and I was tired that charging 8-10 hours by usb and only used for two iPhones charging. Lately, it gets worse. I decided to buy one with much bigger power storage. Even though the size is little big, but I am totally satisfied as I don’t have to charging my power bank every other day now. It has been my third day after the first fully charge, it looks like it can last a week if I use to charge two phones per day. Hopefully the battery life will last.
customer_reviews.author: XD

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery - Needs a travel pouch.
customer_reviews.text: Its a rock solid heavy duty battery. The build quality is excellent. I take it with me for work "all over the place" - it has banged and outright dropped - works just fine. My only knock against this battery is that a travel bag is not included. I have several external batteries and this is the only one I have ever purchased that doesn't include a travel pouch/bag.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper100

customer_reviews.title: Power and Convenience!
customer_reviews.text: Great portable power pack for home or on the go! We bought the same Poweradd awhile back and have been so pleased that we purchased another one to keep at our little condo where we spend 2-3 days a week. Even though it is easy enough to transport back and forth, we decided a second Poweradd would make life so much easier. It packs a lot of charge and we like the convenience of being able to charge multiple devices at once. With 3 adults and a multitude of rechargeable devices in our home, this little pack is in constant use. It's also a convenient backup charger to take along on trips!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a CHAMPION!
customer_reviews.text: it takes like 20 hours to charge, sometimes it glitches a bit and takes a few tries to get something plugged in. But man can you get a ton of charges out of this. For $40 this thing is crazy. It comes with 2 very short mini usb cords which is cool too. As a full time uber driver who wants to save money on gas I take this thing to work everyday to charge all my riders phones and it has yet to fail :) Would def buy another and avoid spending more money!
customer_reviews.author: Scurvy230

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast, in power and size. Although it's fairly large, I have zero complaints because it works so well. The unit arrived and was half charged. I must've charged my phone three times and half of my two tablets before I managed to get it on low in order to do a full-charge. I purchased this for flying and have no doubt that it could power a laptop for an extended period of time. I do recommend buying a case for it, as it is quite large and heavy. It would be awesome if it was water resistant/proof to bring outdoors but other than that, great item!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10 - and I just bought a 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: 1. Easy to travel with (10) 2. Surprisingly lightweight (10) 3. Charges multiple things at once, with out being dead afterwards (10) 4. Easy to recharge the battery (10) 5. Charges an iPad Pro 12.9 more than once (10) I have and still do own multiple battery backup chargers... THIS IS BY FAR THE ABSOLUTE BEST. I find I prefer to use this than even my car or home charger... I’m not limited and it has a ton of juice to keep charging things. Seriously, I absolutely recommend this... I’ll be buying them as Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: #AJmyDJ

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last even 3 months! What a waste of $$$$. Battery is dead, it won't recharge and Amazon won't allow return.
customer_reviews.author: J. Linn

customer_reviews.title: TONS of power here
customer_reviews.text: Portable power for more than a week... Without needing anything else... I have charged my phone on this 5 times already and the power bank is still at a four light charge. If you need power this definitely will meet your needs you WONT need to buy 2 of these or solar panels to compliment it. It's a nice big heavy battery that literally last. I definately see why they put 3 USB ports on it. I mean I am using thing and it acts like it doesn't discharge.
customer_reviews.author: Azzorael

customer_reviews.title: Slow to charge your phone.
customer_reviews.text: This charger is very slow to charge your phone. Not usually concerned with battery packs they charge faster then a wall plug. Most of the time at the same voltage. This one they're here will allow your battery to die as you're playing a game on your phone and charging. So that is very slow.
customer_reviews.author: KVT

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery about a month or so before hurricane harvey and relied on it when we were out of power. Nearly 2 years later this thing is still used regularly in our house. You won’t find many 30,000mah power banks on amazon that are reliable and affordable. Only negative I’d say is that it is quite heavy so you gotta be careful a bit if you want to use it while traveling
customer_reviews.author: Mir Bar

customer_reviews.title: Simply Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for at least a year. This one is a gift for my daughter. It’s lifesaving. The charge lasts for a long time even when I charge multiple products. It’s a little heavy to carry around but worth the sacrifice. I try not to leave home without it and when I do, I regret it big time...like now...sitting in a hospital waiting. It’s simply awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: It broke after 2 months :( - I can’t charge anymore
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It holds a ample amount of energy. Downside is that it doesn't come with its own charger and it takes about two chargers to charge it if you don't want to wait about 8hrs. 8 use it as backup power for my iPad pro. Wish it came in other colors. White gets dirty from nearly anything. It comes with two short usb cords and I've been able to recharge my ipad pro to atleast 70 percent with two lights of energy on it. Its definitely worth the buy and it holds and amazing charge.
customer_reviews.author: William Michael Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Holds HUGE charge and charges devices very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had it long but will update if I run into issues. That said, this is the best charging brick I have ever had, I’ve had 5 over the course of a couple years. I’m in sales and my phone is my world so a tool like this is a must have. This one holds a MASSIVE charge, charges devices the fastest I’ve ever seen and I charged two phones at the same time and still had 4/4 blue lights of charge indicated. I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: RandomTexan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For Hospitalization
customer_reviews.text: Great power pack. Got 2 of these for my Dad while he had stay in hospital. Kept his phone charged at all times. When one had low battery I took home and charged. We kept swapping them out. Worked like a charm. No cords to trip on, kept on bedside table.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t charge my phone anymore
customer_reviews.text: The battery life and how fast it charges my phone is amazing. BUT, my phone recently had a pop up saying “this accessory is not supported.” I thought it was my wire, but after using it with my normal plug-in charger, it works fine. I tried other wires, same pop up comes up. Tried using the other usb slots, still doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Miki

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this battery. However, it is huge so I can’t fit it in my back pocket. Also, I thought it would last a lot longer than it did. I bought two. One for me and one for my son. I have smaller batteries that last longer than this one. It charged my iPad once and I recharged it, and it charged my phone one and a half times. My sons was the same. It is convenient to have though. Over all, I guess I’m happy. Just wish it lasted longer and it was a bit smaller. I’d buy it again anyway bc it is nice to have!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie s.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Buy
customer_reviews.text: My mother made me buy five of these for her apocalyptic ideas and honestly, I'm not mad about it. I've been needing to get myself a portable charger and these are solid bricks. They're not super heavy but they are heavy enough to know that they are some durable product. I thoroughly enjoy it and it lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Nested

customer_reviews.title: I love this portable charger
customer_reviews.text: I love this portable charger. I have had it for about a year now and the convenience of it is unbelievable. I've taken it on a week long camping trip and only had to charge it once before i left to last me the entire trip (only charging my cell phone sometimes 2 cell phones at a time). It does take a while to charge completely, but it lasts about a week. average 10-15 full cell phone charges.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Big and Heavy but Fast Charging and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a weekend trip with plenty of walking. It was phenomenal in FAST charging our 3 cell phones and the kids mini ipad, throughout each day. It does feel HEAVY though so instead of keeping it in a purse and putting weight on my sides, I purchased a small backpack to carry it around. It is also as big as the Ipad mini and the thickness is about two ipad minis.
customer_reviews.author: Cat & Family

customer_reviews.title: Still working perfectly after well over a year of daily use.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this battery since July of 2017, taken it on dozens of trips and use it daily to charge my phone. I'm impressed that after almost a year and a half it still works perfectly with such heavy use. It's a bit bulky and does take a while to charge but I only have to do so once a week so it's not a big deal, and it's slim enough to fit in my purse if needed be. Having this battery to fast charge my and my traveling companions devices on the go has been so useful, and friends have purchased this device because of my experience, definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: It works well. I have an LG phone my husband has something else. we go with friends to play pokemon go and are small rechargers just were not enough. I fully charged this one and we've used it twice now and it still has charge for more times. it is heavy, so it works best for us when we are driving around, I would not want to carry it walking.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend buying at least 1 portable charger of this capacity or more to have around as a back-up. Can't tell you how many times this has saved my butt when I forgot to charge my phone while on the road or just heading out. I've had this for about 1 year now and it still works pretty well! I always keep this charged and often switch between multiple portable chargers so I always have one on hand if I need it. I loved it so much that I even bought 1 for a family member.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Two charging port, great service feedback, great use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one month travel for europe. And i have 3 different battery from this brand coz I loved it. Company feedback is really kind and fast too. I was really impressed with their feedback. I will be keep using it
customer_reviews.author: Keon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I thought it was smaller. It's about the size of a small tablet. For the mAh this thing packs, at that price, it's a steal. This is for heavy duty travels, it can power up your laptop a few times along with whatever other device you have. Make sure to change it a day before as the large battery needs sometime.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ortiz Jr

customer_reviews.title: Power for things like phones, tablets and headphones when you need it.
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy this little device and use it daily. It is small but packs a lot of energy inside it. Takes 12 hours to charge from 0 to fully charged. Ours is used heavily and we charge it about every 3 days but it does everything we ask it to for those 3 days. Very useful tool and I recommend it for people on the go who need backup power for their electronic devices.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon  M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Power All Day. . .
customer_reviews.text: Huge capacity, well constructed, and not as heavy as I might have thought. Double charging ports are a nice touch; this recharges much faster than an earlier model (20,000mAh). Have had several Poweradd products, all have held up well, so long as they haven't been dropped into a swimming pool by one of your kids. . .
customer_reviews.author: B. Barna

customer_reviews.title: Keep 1/2 charge to get most use!
customer_reviews.text: This charger is a little heavy but it has powerful charge and will charge several items at once. If it runs down, it takes long time to fully recharge but if you don’t go below 1/2 charge it’s fine. Overall it’ great!
customer_reviews.author: Snowgoddess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second PowerAdd. The first withstood probably 3 years of heavy use before it konked out...probably because I allowed it to run completely out of charge once too often. I am trusting this new one will serve me as well. My favorite aspect of this remarkable charger is that it does not begin to discharge the subject piece of equipment if left connected after is has fully charged same. Great charger @ a very reasonable price. Keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: Molly K

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: My God has this power bank saved my life so many times. I carry this thing at all times and have used it on several vacations without any sort of issues. It lasts about two weeks on a single charge depending how much you charge your devices. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joel G.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for a weekend driving trip and it was just too perfect for my needs. After I fully charged it up, I was able to keep my phone and three our friends' phones charged all weekend long with no problem. I think I recharged four phones (two Note 9 and two iPhone X) maybe three or four times each and I still had about 15% power leftover. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: AGU3VARA

customer_reviews.title: Not a great brand for a battery pack
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed from this product I’m having a hard time recharging it and battery life is pathetic
customer_reviews.author: david h

customer_reviews.title: Amazing battery life!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in August as a battery back up for my Gopro during the eclipse. I fully charged it the night before. I have since charged my cell phone several times along with the gopro and I still have juice left in this. I have not had to recharge this since August! This is an amazing battery and last a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE This Thing!
customer_reviews.text: Took this to Nepal with me to bring on an Everest Trek. Recharged my Samsung tablet 10 times from varying levels, and never ran dry. Did not need any additional power source for 16 days. Pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Balch

customer_reviews.title: a lot of power, lot of weight
customer_reviews.text: had it for a few months now i think and i’ve had no issues. it’s pretty big tho, i have an iphone 7 plus and it’s larger than my phone and hardly fits in my mini backpack. it’s also pretty heavy especially since i need it to carry it around and takes over a day to charge (aka more than 24 hours, i started charging it yesterday morning and now it’s the afternoon and it’s barley half way charged). as long as it’s fully charged, you have the patience to wait for it to charge and don’t mind having a huge brick in your bag, it comes in handy especially since it has 3 ports
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: brick powerhouse!
customer_reviews.text: this thing is a serious battery bank. It's heavy (not perfect for compact travel) but, this thing holds a large amount of charges and i feel was well worth its price compared to several others I've tried now. If you need to carry this much juice with you and don't mind a brick in your bag, i strongly recommend this one. On a side note, if you carry this in a purse this may double as a self defence item, i certainly wouldn't want to get hit with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, flexible, sophisticated charger and a good value.  Recommend without any reservations.
customer_reviews.text: The external battery is a little larger and heavier than I expected, but I should have known better as I am aware battery weight almost always increases with increased power and this charger is powerful 30,000 mA! I have recharged my iPad several times as well as my iPhone. It is still ~75% charged as far as I can tell. I like the fact that it has two input micro slots and 3 output USB slots.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Chapin

customer_reviews.title: Works great, charges Ipad 3 quickly
customer_reviews.text: Works great, charges Ipad 3 quickly, but plenty of charge left to charge phone a couple times. Great product and a great price point. Only complaint is that it is a very large unit, not conveniently portable. Works fine in backpack while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: sam kem

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: A bit bigger then what I had imagined (a few inches) but I love this thing very powerful and 3 usb charging ports great for when you need to charge all three of your devices
customer_reviews.author: RamRam

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: The mobile charger is huge, like a small iPad. It also requires permission to take on a plane as it is above 100wh limit. I’m told you can just request it and it should be allowed but depends on airline. Other than that it works well and can charge a lot before it dies.
customer_reviews.author: Bigrob808

customer_reviews.title: Best powerhouse portable on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best powerhouse portable on the market. You will not regret this purchase that's for sure. I just bought a 2nd one to have a spare because the rest of my family keeps stealing it to charge their phones. I had three phones charging on this and made everybody very happy! Lighting fast! I cannot say enough positive things you just have to try it for yourself. It's not small but it will keep all your electronics charged!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one of these.
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. Great device. Size is bigger than I thought but still love it
customer_reviews.author: Eveler

customer_reviews.title: Its heavy and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This charger is heavy but it works well. An excellent way to ensure that you are not out of battery life. It can charge several items at once. It's a power bank and if this were a commercial bank..this is the one you would want to bank on.
customer_reviews.author: skbrhea

customer_reviews.title: The power bank came with a charge which I like. I also like that their is a rubber ...
customer_reviews.text: The power bank came with a charge which I like. I also like that their is a rubber band for the cable. I love that it has two ports for charging to charge it faster. The manual has useful information display in a clear and clean way.
customer_reviews.author: charmaine

customer_reviews.title: The best battery I've ever bought in probably the most useful ...
customer_reviews.text: The best battery I've ever bought in probably the most useful Amazon purchase ever can charge your phone once a day for like 5 days I have a ZTE Max phone which has a decent battery size can be used in camping for USB fans an addition to a solar panel emergency backup power or any backpack accessory definitely has a decent amount of weight like 2 water bottles I want to buy another one but I don't even need one I have this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its not a light weight item.
customer_reviews.text: I like not having to charge my battery every day or very often. I have a Samsung edge smart phone. Battery will give me 6 to 7 charges before completely having to recharge. It is heavy, but expected for amount of charges it provides. Like the fact that it has 3 usb ports, i could charge 3 devices at same time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ferreyra

customer_reviews.title: Power to spare
customer_reviews.text: Well made solid case. Can last 2 -3 days.Takes a long time to charge due to large capacity. Would be great to have a fast charger. It is really convenient to have portability and power to spare. Charges our phones, laptop and tablets with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: We’d buy again
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad for his birthday. He had been wanting one for a while. His only complaint was it was a little bigger than he thought it would be, but said it’s the best one he’s owned!
customer_reviews.author: Ajleishman

customer_reviews.text: Never reviewed anything on Amazon before but I absolutely had to for this. Poweradd far surpassed my expectations. For the first two weeks of my vacation I relied solely on this battery pack for my htc 10 and charged it every night. Plus I would charge other phones on top of all that and it just seemed like it would never die. Took everything like an absolute champ. The only thing I would comment on is on future revision make it Usb Type C rechargable instead of micro USB but that was never really a problem anyway, just nitpicking. If you're contemplating this trust me it will not let you down.
customer_reviews.author: Pimptin

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!, stopped worked inside of 6 months
customer_reviews.text: JUNK! Worked until it didn't. I bought this product at the end of December 2017 and by June 15th 2018 it was no longer able to charge my phone or other USB chargable devices. The unit will still take a charge however the USB ports have stopped charging, tried all 2 ports and a variety of cables. I would steer clear of this brand and this device. I bought on a lightening deal so I figure the company knew it was crap and dumped them into the marketplace at a discount to recoup the cash.
customer_reviews.author: P. B.

customer_reviews.title: Will keep your devices charged many times.
customer_reviews.text: So much power that I can charge my, OPO 7 5g McClaren 12 times and still have power.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Fountain Electric

customer_reviews.title: Charges both my phones and my bluetooth speaker for days ...
customer_reviews.text: Charges both my phones and my bluetooth speaker for days. Only negative is the charging cords it came with are way short. But i have cords a plenty so for me that didnt matter. Charges fairly quick for its capacity. BATTERY ONLY LASTED LESS THAN A YEAR.
customer_reviews.author: Marc shakter

customer_reviews.title: I am surprised!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, I had been using it to charge my iPhone 5s since the date I received it. And two days later, I still using it to charge my phone, so far my phone has been charged for about 5 to 6 times and it still can be use to charge phones!!
customer_reviews.author: DarkistVoid

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased and returned many power packs because they don't put out the power stated. 1.5lbs wow, great weapon in a pinch. 😉 The duel charging ports are great, saves a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Daily Digger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Really amazing product. Battery last a long time and I charge multiple things at once. Never let's me down. I'm not worried about breaking it and it's been tossed around quite a bit. It's kinda heavy but that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best battery I own.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome power. Charges my iPad a few times with enough left over for my iPhone. Best battery I own out of several. It’s a tank! The first full charge with only one cable connected took 2days! It charges significantly faster with both charging cables attached.
customer_reviews.author: David Bock

customer_reviews.title: PLENTY OF CHARGING POWER
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. Lasts a long time. Purchased 2 for hurricane preparation. I use every night for phone charging.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Me

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic power bank
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic power bank. I use two iPhone charging blocks and the supplied cables to charge this. It is hard to find a case that fits this perfectly so I ended up buying a case for a 7” GPS and it fits well enough to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This has came in handy so many times. Keeps a charge good. Get 2 to 3 phone charges from one charge of battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: June Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality use them everyday.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one two years ago still going strong, like them so much I bought another one all the power you're ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: Brought this along on our transatlantic vacation. It was a great relief to know we could change our kids tablets, our mobile phones, bluetooth headphones, etc. during the flight. In fact, using the device was so convenient, and the battery so long lasting, that we regularly used the device once we arrived in Europe as an alternative to the adapter we brought along. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Martino

customer_reviews.title: Need to push the power button twice to turn it off
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would turn off automatically if it didn't detect a device however the one I got required me to push the power button twice to turn it off. Other than that it's good.
customer_reviews.author: chue

customer_reviews.title: [] My biggest powerbank
customer_reviews.text: This is a monster powerbank. It has huge capacity and understandably size is also big. It has 2 ports to charge and needs over night charging. It has 3 output ports and charge 3 devices simultaneously. Good when traveling long distance or camping when their is no alternative power source
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth cost!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend has one and I just bought one for myself! Works great! It was already fully charged when I got it! Perfect for travel charging!!
customer_reviews.author: Batman6000

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Love this power brick, I was without power for 3 days, kept my phone charged even while watching movies, playing games, also kept my Apple Watch charged, still had 3 lights even after no power for 3 days during Hurricane Florence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Charger!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a three night camping trip. It was able to charge two cellphones and a USB fan for those three nights and still had some juice when I returned from my trip. Great product which I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Afton Esson

customer_reviews.title: Main selling point: excellent battery length.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product November 12th (the date now being 12/19) and I still am on my first full charge after moderate use throughout a month of use (I play pokemon go, which is a huge battery drainer). I can't help but feel it charges more than advertised (I am currently using an iPhone 7 Plus). Of note, it does take a while to fully charge. I suggest leaving it charging overnight. I was a little surprised about the size, but with how long it lasts, it's totally worth it. I can still fit it in my coat or backpocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery Charger
customer_reviews.text: Excellent battery charger. Use anywhere! Life saver at times to keep phone charged! Nake sure to to the case for it!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Perry

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great product , but it doesn't have the port for iphones , you have to have the cable as the usb to charge iphones ,
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this powerbank it charges my phone fast and holds ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this powerbank it charges my phone fast and holds a charge all day and more even when I’m FaceTiming. If you charge it from empty to full it does take several hours.
customer_reviews.author: ♦️Sierra Becker♦️

customer_reviews.title: Keeps on charging
customer_reviews.text: This never ran out of juice! I charged kindle at least 5x and iPhone and other devices. Update: two months later I got the Powerradd out to charge electronics AND it was still fully charged!!!
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie P.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: It can last sooo many hours without charge! The only thing to note ... the size of this thing is a little too big. Cannot carry it on a small purse. Great for tote bags though!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice & compactQ
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact size Took several hours to charge up. Have used it only once ti charge my iPad. Look forward to using it with my iPhone. .
customer_reviews.author: BTD

customer_reviews.title: Needs charged 10 hours to last a few days great for the price charges up to three devices.
customer_reviews.text: A little to big could be lighter. Powers up to three devices and lasts a few days. Great for the price and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power but didn't come with a way to charge it.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to charge and I would have given it 5 stars but they don't include a power adapter to charge it, only USB cables. It did keep all my devices fully charged through for a solid week at boy scout summer camp. 2 phones & USB fan that ran all night every night.
customer_reviews.author: Myridge

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not pocket size so not very portable but holds lots of power. Fits in purse.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I was on a flight and charged 2 phones, a laptop, a tablet and AirPod and hardly budged on the batter life of the power bank. 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: I use it for my dash cam
customer_reviews.text: Make sure that yours stays on the whole time. check it when you get back to the car. You could also charge your phone while you are powering your dash cam
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot but too heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I almost love this charger. I use both chargers at the same time to charge it faster and just plug it in over night. It lasts more than 7 full charges. It's power saving and turns off by itself. The only thing I HATE about it is the weight! It's soo heavy and kind of bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail T.

customer_reviews.title: Longest charge
customer_reviews.text: This little dude is freaking excellent it’s saved me and my phone in many a dark time
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: Works way better then I expected
customer_reviews.text: Works way better then I expected. I get more charges on my Samsung phone then the company claims plus charge my Xbox controller at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Derek k

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Large, heavy and powerful this is a great power bank. Off a full charge this power bank fully recharged my samsung tab s3 twice and my galaxy s5 2.5 times. On the second time I charged the tab s3 I watched at least 30 minutes of Netflix so that soaked up some battery also
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

product_meta.title: POWERADD Pilot Pro3 30000mAh Portable Charger Ultra High Capacity Power Bank, Fast-Recharging External Battery with Dual Inputs and 3 Outputs, Compatible with iPhone, Samsung, LG and More (White)
feature_bullets: Amazing Monster Capacity: 30000mAh power bank is able to fully charge your iPhone 7 more than 10 times or a Nexus 6P more than 5.5 times, or a 9.7-inch iPad Pro more than 2.5 times, worry-free with such plenty of juice even if you are on a long-term camp or hiking outside in the forest and mountains.

Incredible Fast Replenish: Dual inputs (5V/4A total) support simultaneously recharge with included 2 micro cables, which means you need only 8-10 hours to fully charge a 30000mAh external charger bank.

Smart PowerSI Charge: 3 USB ports combined 4.5amp output, auto-detect the charging requirements from your devices and provide max speed up to 2.4A per port, simultaneously charge 3 devices is available.
Premium Quality: Built-in safeguards protect your devices against excessive current, overheating, and overcharging, grade A+ Li-polymer battery cell supports more than 500 cycle charges.
What You Get: Poweradd Pilot Pro3 x 1, USB Cable x 2, User Manual x 1, Feedback Card x 1; Poweradd Offers 24-Month limited product warranty and 24h*7d customer service.
